comment.author: 13893317@N06
comment._content: Wooden coaling tower and two steel sanding towers are shown here.  Two of the steam engines shown here are 2-8-2's of the 3160 class.  On the right is a Santa Fe Caswell gondola commonly used in coal service.

comment.author: 24360819@N02
comment._content:
I can literally look out my window and see the exact spot this photo was taken.
The depot is still there, but much has changed around it.
